description: A React component that renders a button to initiate the Jira OAuth authorization flow by redirecting the user to the backend endpoint which then redirects to Jira's authorization URL.

methods.name: ConnectJiraButton
methods.description: A React functional component that renders a button to start Jira OAuth flow, handling state and redirection logic.

methods.name: handleClick
methods.description: Handler function that initiates the OAuth flow by fetching the authorization URL and redirecting the browser.
